programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Jessica releases a video online that casts doubt on Shen Yang's character. Meanwhile, May Wan worries that Ah Hock might stake his claim on Maxine.

programme.title: Survivor 41
programme.desc: Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver's Christmas Cookbook
programme.desc: Over the many years that he's cooked Christmas, Jamie Oliver has experimented with loads of different ways of cooking the classics. But this year, he's sharing his ultimate recipes - the epic dishes that he'll be cooking for his own family on Christmas Day.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is O. King Ozzy of Planet O is sick and needs a special coral from Planet Earth to make him better. Can our superheroes uncover this coral for King O?

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus
programme.desc: Mister D takes them to an Egg workshop! Then the adventurers continues with a visit to a chocolate moulding workshop. Lastly, will our adventurers be able to bake a cake?

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Mr Guard gets Paula and her friends to help put together a surprise birthday party for Aamil. But Billy has trouble keeping the surprise a secret. Will he ruin it? Paula goes on an adventure by herself to help her friends in the jungle. However, she faces obstacles that are really hard to solve alone. Will she succeed or can she count on her friends when she needs them the most?

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: The Ollie Squad are spring cleaning! When Sloppy puts off tidying his room, he goes into an declutter frenzy. Meanwhile, Poly-GON searches for a clue to their weakness by dumpster diving and finds an unexpected companion.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Pony Life S2
programme.desc: In the brand new Pony Life, the ponies relocate to Sugarcube Corner, a local bakery hangout run by Pinkie Pie, for more magical adventures!

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: Every cat in the neighborhood is afraid of Gaby, the reporter cat. She's always snooping for scoops and taking photos of cats in awkward moments, like Meatball with fingers in his and others' nose! Even the bravest cats cut and run when they see her, to escape her camera! But when she's caught by Brutus the cat catcher, the Buffycats run to help because... she's one of them, after all!

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: When Gas is around, every single cat in the neighborhood disappears... He's just the smelliest cat in town! Moreover, he loves his stink, as it allows him to scare off others and eat their food. The Buffycats will find out that behind all those stinky clouds hides a new cat-friend!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: As Ash and Goh pursue their goals, they meet an exceptionally driven Pokemon with a big ambition of its own!

programme.title: Agents Of Sprawl
programme.desc: Will the real Meiling please stand up? The virus, Thought 8, takes control of Meiling's body in order to infiltrate UnyX's team and locate their base. Meanwhile, the real Meiling goes rogue in a temporary body. To get everything back to normal, the team has to band together and defeat Thought 8!

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Ukio's Unicrest proves to be a serious challenge for Valt's team. Rantaro steps into the ring but soon discovers that Ukio is holding back. When Ken starts acting strange, the team struggles to figure out what's wrong.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet Christmas Special
programme.desc: This festive edition of Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet has the much-loved cook and broadcaster showcasing delicious recipes as well as passing on tips to help viewers create these treats themselves. Rachel shakes up the traditional dessert menu and serves up something a little different for the holiday season, with some exciting flavours and aromas to help viewers create a memorable Christmas. Dishes include festive fruity steamed pudding, mulled port pears with port jelly, etc.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Much as the Swiss love their fondue, the Chinese are passionate about hot pot; or more commonly known as steamboat by Singaporeans. We travel to hot pot city Chengdu, the birth place of the spicy hot pot. Food Notes find out why people here eat spicy hot pot even during the hot summer months.

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: Larry and Ah Gek juggle the running of their stall with looking after their granddaughter, Michelle. Rani and Arun are visited by a mysterious stranger, Prakash, who claims to be Chandra's son. And Yi Kai is visited at his stall by a familiar stranger... Julian, Audrey's ex-fiance.

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: Mr Owyang, a wealthy business mogul visits 128 Circle Food Centre, sparking rumours that he might be buying it over. Dominic and Sherry are involved in an altercation at their stall that will have far-reaching consequence for 128 Circle.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S7 - Hands Of Time
programme.desc: Shortly after the Day of the Departed, Master Wu awaits his old enemy Acronix to complete a battle they began 40 years ago. But Acronix hits Wu with the Time Punch, which causes him to start rapidly aging! Acronix escapes and reunites with his twin brother Krux, who has been living the past 40 years in disguise as the lovable Dr. Sander Saunders. During this time, Krux has been breeding a new slithering enemy: the Vermillion Warriors.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Intergalactic Games
programme.desc: Facing off against Korguar Academy and the Female Furies, can the Super Hero High team bring home the championship? Let the games and the action begin!

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: Why Not?
programme.desc: In this spooky episode, Dr Why and his brave assistant Knot seek to find out if ghosts can really exist? When they manage to make objects move without touching them and witness an actual ghostly figure in a haunted office, it appears highly possible that ghosts could probably exist. But do ghosts really exist???

programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

programme.title: News Tonight

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

The little buses are named Tino for a baby dinosaur and have fun together in the garage.

programme.title: 梅兰芳大剧院《白蛇传》
programme.desc: (PG) 在峨眉山修炼了千年的白蛇、青蛇化作白素贞和小青来到西湖，巧遇许仙扫墓归来。邂逅相遇，白素贞与许仙结成佳偶。法海和尚从中破坏，许仙听信了他的挑拨，于端阳节用雄黄酒灌醉白素贞现出蛇形，吓坏了许仙。白素贞醒来，去仙山盗来灵芝，将许仙救活。许仙病愈，又被法海诱上金山，白素贞偕小青到金山索夫，法海不放。白素贞被迫反抗，大战金山寺。许仙逃离金山寺，与白素贞于西湖断桥边相见，白素贞不计旧怨，一同到许仙姐姐家中，重整家园。.

programme.title: 食在有价值 2
programme.desc: (重) 主持人到世界各地了解食物价格上涨的因素，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 暖心厨房
programme.desc: (重) 这一集的暖心厨房就坐落在南大宿舍的食堂里。这个由一群大学生经营的【米粉先生】档口在短短两个月内就筹集了高达16万的善款，分派出多达6万份的膳食。谢韵仪能否跟上他们青春的步伐，一起炒出美味的米粉呢？.

programme.title: 与神的约定
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 娜京遭停职，还有可能失去遵叙。娜京想到显祐的癌症可能复发了，于是想利用显祐的病情逼尚天向她低头。.

programme.title: VIP
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 贞善为了找出传匿名简讯的人以及其目的，于是委托叔叔真哲追踪发信者。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩) 诗月的孩子早一个月出世，让月天怀疑孩子并非光日的骨肉。泰俊答应月天会做亲子鉴定，但是光日却坚决反对。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 诗月去找月天，提议由月天和孩子做亲子鉴定。月天同意了。.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自然奇观，.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 卡米尔先生的家在害虫防治专家的协助下除掉臭虫后，室内设计师源顺得面临挑战了。他需要为这个一家十口居住在这有限空间的三房式组屋重新规划，给他们设计充足的空间和储藏室。.

programme.title: 优雅的家
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 锡熙在前往股东大会时，在家门口被警察查出了酒驾，被带去了警察局。股东大会因此取消了锡熙的竞争权。把哲熙扶上了代理事的位置。老会长王表得知孙女锡熙没当选代表理事，再度病倒。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 S5
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的故事.

programme.title: 世界多美丽
programme.desc: (重)《世界多美丽》是一档真人秀纪实类旅游栏目。将在世界范围内美丽、知名、热议话题目的地旅游体验，通过资深旅游达人的深度游视觉，在目的地，深入旅游体验和大家共享热点话题、旅行感悟，发现新视野，展现不一样的旅行新魅力。.

programme.title: 打工捱世界 S2
programme.desc: (重) 这一季的《打工捱世界》，袁伟豪（Ben）和杨明（阿杨）将从游客看不到的角度认识非洲坦桑尼亚和意大利威尼斯。非洲坦桑尼亚并非一个富裕国家，他们在当地打工后有什么体验，又是否会感到富足？ 在「旅游天堂」意大利威尼斯打工依旧是要从低做起！担任渔民，天还没亮便要开工，辛劳而不浪漫。二人还要出卖劳力送货、街头卖艺，又担当餐厅侍应生招呼客人，吸取不一样的工作体验。.

programme.title: 与神的约定
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 在旭怀疑娜京早就知道显祐的病复发了，不但自私地向大家隐瞒显祐的情况，而且还计划利用遵叙达到自己的目标。在旭觉得娜京太过分，誓言不会原谅娜京，也不会让遵叙留在娜京身边。.

programme.title: VIP
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 贞善经过几日的纠结，终于选择对玄雅说出盛俊外遇的事情。玄雅劝盛俊不要再继续错下去，并开始替贞善留意起可疑的对象。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 六月决心振作，要黄在福借他一千万，他承诺一年后会如数奉还。六月也要在福帮他弄一个新的身分，并改名为吴太阳。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 太阳决定去纽约赚钱，几年后成功回国。太阳回国后，买了张家隔壁的房子。太阳让帮佣拿请帖去张家，邀他们来聚餐。.

programme.title: 生活达人 S13
programme.desc: (双声道-中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 优雅的家
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 老会长王表葬礼结束后，帝菊威胁郑管家与尹律師，让他们和锡熙断绝联系。帝菊要允道成为TOP正式成员，负责监视锡熙。允道见TOP内部有详尽的资料库，有些心动。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 生活达人 S13
programme.desc: (重)(双声道-中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择
programme.desc: (重)《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 致2020的我们

programme.desc: What was worn hundreds of years ago are most likely not worn again today, for practicality reasons.
